p: Here, we used a new, non-parametric approach to Granger causal inference ( Chattopadhyay, 2014) (Approach 1). In contrast to state-of-the-art binary tests ( Baek and Brock, 1992; Hiemstra and Jones, 1994), we computed the degree of causal dependence between quantized data streams from stationary ergodic sources in a non-parametric, non-linear setting.
